title: LUMINAIRES
fullText:
Luminaires shall comply with the relevant requirements of IEC 60092-306 or the AS/NZS 60598 series of Standards. Discharge luminaires shall be tested for EMI/EMC compliance with EN 55015.
LED lighting modules shall comply with IEC 62031.
Luminaires likely to be exposed to risk of mechanical damage shall either be protected against such damage or of especially robust construction. The construction and installation of luminaires should be appropriate to their location and environment.
The luminaire manufacturer's installation instructions regarding clearance distances from combustible materials shall be followed.
